<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/webhooks"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



    Create a new webhook for the Account.

    ### Permissions
    * `webhook:write`

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["event_types","url"],"type":"object","properties":{"url":{"maxLength":250,"minLength":1,"type":"string","description":"URL of where to send notifications for provided event types","example":"https://examplewebsite.com/notification"},"event_types":{"minItems":1,"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"A list of event types to send notifications for","example":["connection-invitation:accept","connection-invitation:decline","seller-onboarding:update"]}},"additionalProperties":false,"title":"SaveWebhookRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
